works.description:
This is a blog I am making for my school.
 
A boy got to know about this & is copying every piece of information as I 

post on my blog. I post on my blog only what's truly mine. I have a  
homepage whose design has been fully copied by him(including the  
background). He is using the exact same things I am using on my Pic  
Gallery. Even the format of my Contact Me page has been copied by him. You
 
can also check the time when I posted a thing on my blog which would be  
earlier than his posting on his blog. I request you to please take the  
strictest action.
